column4: i am  using wicd Network Manager, can i use 3g internet on this Network Manager?
the network-manager in intrepid has 3g support yes, and my 3g usb modem worked out of the box
as i already said, i am not using the default Network Manaer of 8.10, i am using Wicd network manager
well then maybe you should ask in wicd's forums or irc chan
may i ask why your not using ubuntu's NM???
well then sudo apt-get install network-manager
the 2 network managers will start fighting each other :)
using a package that isn't included with ubuntu, and coming here for support is a no no...hehe
not saying no one will help you but....
well then ask around wicd's support channels either forums or irc
ahhhh :( but wicd is not a ubuntu package?
remove wicd and install network-manager 0.7, my internet works fine but the icon is not showing on the panel . what to do ? thanks
